attributes.additional_details:
Give all unemployed people free access to internet so that they can do online training
The online training should be compulsory and 2 hours per day. This would allow all unemployed to gain skills that they need for any level and would be set  to improve over time. 1 day a month this would need to be in DHS office in groups to help with training and avoid fraud. Anyone missing training more than x times looses benefits
